name: The Blue Cat
description:
A little girl finds a cat and learns about love and compassion.

An interactive fiction game that is told us through the eyes of a 6-year-old girl about her friendship with a stray cat, that helps her thrive in an abusive environment and teaches her a new form of love and resilience.



• Classic JRPG pixel art
• Hand-drawn cutscenes
• Immersive soundtrack
